author: John Shay
text:
Do any communities have ordinances restricting the usage of water, especially irrigation water during summer months?  If so, please send them to me in Word or PDF format.  Thanks.
John Shay
City Manager
City of Ludington, Michigan
title: Ordinance to Restrict Water Usage
